name: Smith Carpenter's Masonry
introduction: The Smith Carpenter's Masonry is looking for new bricklayers to join their team. You'll be working with stone and mortar to create sturdy structures.

results: {name} decided not to take any chances and worked hard, grinding stone into a fine powder and mixing it with water to create mortar.
A few others in the masonry were chatting about. As Smith Caprtenter passed, {name} could see him glaring at them. They quickly stopped talking and got back to work.

{name} listened to the daily gossip as they all mixed the mortar. It was mostly about the weather and how it was affecting the crops. Nothing too exciting, but it was nice to hear what everyone else was up to.
